short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate github release notes with 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension which helpes you to create release notes on Github with single click. Configuration option allows you to specify Blacklist & add base link for Jira Tickets. 

Want to contribute? Head over to https://github.com/pratiknikam/github-release-helper
